about.p1: I grew up taking things apart to see how they worked. Now I put them together, building full-stack systems that are clean, scalable, and powered by AI.
about.p2: I like working where solid engineering meets AI. When I'm not shipping end-to-end features, I'm bringing AI tools into our dev workflow or helping teammates level up. Software is a team sport, and I love being part of it.

ide.comment:
// I build end-to-end systems enhanced by AI,
// bridging design and high-performance engineering.

exp1.title: Full-Stack AI Engineer,
exp1.desc: I own projects end to end as a Full-Stack AI Engineer. Built an enterprise admin platform on my own: 29 backend modules, 225 endpoints, multi-currency budgeting with approval flows, and the full frontend, all in 8 business days. Drove adoption of AI tools (including Claude Code) across the team, which made a real difference in productivity. I also handle reporting with Fast Reports and mentor interns and junior devs.

exp2.title: Software Developer,
exp2.desc: Played a key role in building a unified design system, mentored junior developers, and optimized application data layers to improve performance and responsiveness.

projects.featured_description: This project showcases advanced development skills and best practices.

contact.subtitle: Have a project, or just want to connect? My inbox is open.
